eu.amidst.core.learning.structural

Interface StructuralLearningAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NaiveBayesStructure

    public interface StructuralLearningAlgorithm
    This interface defines the Algorithm for learning the BayesianNetwork graphical structure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DAG getDAG()
      Returns the DAG structure.
      void initLearning()
      Initializes the structural learning process.
      void runLearning()
      Runs the structural learning process.
      void setDataStream(DataStream<DataInstance> data)
      Sets the DataStream to be used by this StructuralLearningAlgorithm.
      void setParallelMode(boolean parallelMode)
      Sets the parallel processing mode.
      double updateModel(DataOnMemory<DataInstance> batch)
      Updates the model using a given DataOnMemory object.

      • setParallelMode

        void setParallelMode(boolean parallelMode)
        Sets the parallel processing mode.
        Parameters:
